mainText:
My name is Ben and I'm 8.  Steve Jobs was  
my hero like Derek Jeter. Steve Jobs helps the world and Derek Jeter  
helps the pitcher when he's doing bad he calms the pitcher down when  
he's stressed I think there is a similarity with these two amazing  
people. Steve Jobs changed the world, he did things no one can do, and  
every one's heart dropped when he was diagnosed with cancer. So the  
point is Steve Jobs will be remembered for ever like Babe Ruth or  
Thomas Jefferson. Now I hope Apple will invent and make thing like the  
iphone 5,6,7,8,9 and so on.
author: Ben
